Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Trucker \Truck"er\, n. One who trucks; a trafficker. [1913 Webster]
No man having ever yet driven a saving bargain with this great trucker for souls. --South. [1913 Webster]
trucker n : someone who drives a truck as an occupation [syn: {teamster}, {truck driver}]
